MineralSite.name: NI 43-101 Technical Report (4) for the Kisladag v Project in Middle East, Turkey dated 2003.pdf

document.title: NI 43-101 Technical Report (4) for the Kisladag v Project in Middle East, Turkey dated 2003.pdf
document.description: The document is a feasibility study for the Kisladag gold project in Turkey, conducted by Eldorado Gold Corporation with various technical contributions, aiming to provide detailed insights into geology, mineral reserves, mining, and economic viability.
